$PHUN @OleLucky look at my last post.... recall that Randall, in his video interviews noted the focus of Distributing Data.... 
 
... then, Randall mentions on several videos that they run on $ORCL  
 
$ORCL is in the process of greatly expanding their Global Cloud through adding Hyper-Scale Cloud Data Centers worldwide... $ORCL is known for their Database, Infrastructure and Security that they can provide and quietly are building out vision of one end-to-end Cloud. 
 
As I noted that if they acquired a majority to TikTok, that would have been a major win for $ORCL as the world is doing commerce through such apps. 
 
Not starting rumor of $ORCL buying $PHUN but I see that $PHUN could be a necessity for one of the Big Cloud Vendors as they need $PHUN's strategic vision built into Phunware and cheaper to buy $PHUN than (re)build it themselves.

$PHUN @OleLucky What I also wonder is what Big Software Company could be waiting for the right "milestone" to make a move to acquire $PHUN ??? 
 
The fact that $PHUN doesn't talk a lot about $DWAC has been stated that $PHUN went through the "go public via SPAC" already and absolutely had to remain quiet during that process to not upset regulators.  TMTG through $DWAC is going through that right now and Randall and Alan have stated that it's not their place to discuss... ok, I accept that as a very good practice anyway. 
 
But being independent also makes $PHUN more valuable in form of customer acquisition and being heads down to grow revenue and EPS. 
 
Remember $ORCL bidding on TikTok?  I thought brilliant move, unfortunately too much concern over China and not approved.  TikTok would play same role that $PHUN plays right now.  This positioning could make any larger Software Company bigger than Amazon. 
 
BTW - $PHUN is available as partner of Amazon 
 
Thoughts?
